Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and high-quality materials, it's truly a remarkable item. I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or serve you exceptionally well in your daily activities. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, I'm extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $200. This is an opportunity to own a piece that exceeds expectations and offers great value. I look forward to hearing your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
